description: ESLint configuration file for a Vue.js project using TypeScript and Vitest, defining linting rules, file inclusion/exclusion, and plugin configurations.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Defines an ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support, accepting multiple configuration objects.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs
methods.description: Contains predefined Vue + TypeScript ESLint config sets.

methods.name: configureVueProject
methods.description: Commented out in source; intended to add support for additional script languages in Vue files.

methods.name: skipFormatting
methods.description: A plugin to skip formatting rules, integrated into ESLint configuration.
